name: Spiky Platformer
description:
22 levels of raising difficulty.

The base idea of this game is to make a precise speedrunning game with a feeling similar to the You Have 10 Seconds serie by Tamationgames but still beatable without going fast. The game is for almost everyone (the last world can be hard).

Estimated play time : 10 to 20 minutes.

You need to collect 10 coins to unlock the last world !

Controls :

A/Q/Left Arrow > move left

D/Right Arrow > move right

X/Space/Up Arrow > jump

R > reset

On menu :

Up/Down to move.

Enter to confirm.

R to reset savefile.
